title: 3Peace Lovers
text:
3Peace Lovers (stylized 3Peaceâ˜†Lovers) was a Japanese project group formed by Happinet in 2012. The group consists of 3 members: actor Yoshihide Sasaki, visual kei band member Hayato Nikaido, and ZE:A member Ha Min-woo. The group was put together as a crossover between J-pop, visual kei rock, and K-pop, which each member represents respectively.


== Members ==
Yoshihide Sasaki
Hayato Nikaido
Ha Min-woo
